oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harts Bakery Job No. 36595
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1145) for an order placed by Harts Bakery for 50 two color window cards for a performance of the Slim Rhodes Show at West Side High School in Heber Springs, Arkansas on April 9 and 100 two color window cards for a performance of the Slim Rhodes Show at the Jarvis super Market in Potosi, Missouri on April 10. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
